name: Spaceman Rise: Dark Flying Sky
description:
The Spaceman want to go up to the space but the hurdles is a big problem in between; you have to help the rocket boy to climb up as much as possible! Just put the hurdles by a side with a swipe!
A game with a mixed up new idea will let you engage with the play more and more! The graphics and looks are of another level!

Features:
Feasible UI
Smooth Gameplay
HD graphics
Astonishing Color Combination
Eye Catching Looks
